GSD.description:
f2fs: fix to do sanity check on summary info

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 0922ad64ccefa3e483e84355942b86e13c8fea68. For more details please see the references link.
